change.changenote: Section 3 (3) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 13/2011, effective September 1, 2011.

subsection.subsectiontext: An assessor may undertake an assessment even if the adult consistently objects so long as the assessment can be accurately completed using observational information and information gathered from other sources.

change.changenote: Section 6 BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 13/2011, effective September 1, 2011.

section.marginalnote: Notifying others of outcome of assessment
section.sectiontext: On completing the assessment, the team of assessors, or, if there is only one assessor under section 2 (1) (b), that assessor, must, in writing, inform the following of the details and results of the assessment and must provide them with a completed copy of the incapability assessment report in Form 1:

paragraph.paragraphtext: if present during the assessment, the adult's spouse, near relative or friend;
the designated agency that asked for the assessment.
